info: The Mercedes-Benz X-Class (W470) is a pickup truck that was sold by the German automaker Mercedes-Benz, a division of German company Daimler AG. Unveiled at a world premiere in Cape Town in July 2017, the Mercedes-Benz pickup took its chassis from the Nissan Navara and employed many Mercedes-specific features and technologies (including some engines not shared with the Navara). It went on sale in late 2017.
